SKILLS

Competence & Experience

Since I started my journey developing websites I’ve done work for a marketing agency, a startup, local businesses, I’ve been a project owner and collaborated with people to create web products for both business and consumer use.

I create easy to use, responsive websites. The main area of my expertise is front-end development, HTML, CSS, JS and ReactJS.

I can create new projects, add new features, bugfixes, API integrations, optimization, responsiveness, unit testing, web accessibility, collect user metrics and more.

I'm also good with WordPress and I create beautiful user friendly UX design with Figma.
